content: In this presentation I try to spurr discussion of the hows and whys of organizing data science projects.

content: During this lab meeting I want to discuss the current status of the SRA project.
title: SRA PacBio Update

class: title, smokescreen, shelf, no-footer background-image: url(cover.png)
SRA Update (PacBio) June 3, 2019 class: col-2
Adult vs Larval Testis Adult * 50 testes * 3 Size Fractions * PacBio RSII * 209,637 CCS * 4,532 Genes Covered - 46 CCS / Coverged Gene * 8,053 Isoforms Covered - 26 CCS / Coverged Isoform
Larval * 40 testes * 2 Size Fractions * PacBio Sequel * 1,219,163 CCS * 10,042 Genes Covered - 121 CCS / Coverged Gene * 36,642 Isoforms Covered - 33 CCS / Coverged Isoform
